attributes.action: reduce waste from wraping going to land fill.
attributes.additional_details:
That the Goverment makes the food and retail industry start to reduce or make to be able to be recycle all food and packaging .With in 5 years all plastic bags are with drawn and stopped. Unless fully bio degradeble. IE dog poo bags, black plastic waste bin bags etc.
Make all Councils recycle all food trays and plastic packaging .
